name: 曾德樟
objective:
Lab 0 Introduction to LabVIEW 
Lab 1 Signal and System 
Lab 2 AM and FM Modulation
Lab 3 Amplitude Shift Keying (ASK)
Lab 4 Frequency Shift Keying (FSK)
Lab 5 Phase Shift Keying (PSK) 
Lab 6 Differential Phase Shift Keying (DPSK) 
Lab 7 Minimum Shift Keying  (MSK)
Lab 8 Quadrature Amplitude Modulation (QAM)
Lab 9 Introduction to USRP
schedule:
Lab 0 Introduction to LabVIEW (2 weeks)
Lab 1 Signal and System (2 week)
Lab 2 AM and FM Modulation (2 week)
Lab 3 Amplitude Shift Keying (ASK) (2 weeks)
Lab 4 Frequency Shift Keying (FSK) (2 week)
Lab 5 Phase Shift Keying (PSK) (2 weeks)
Lab 6 Differential Phase Shift Keying (DPSK) (2 weeks)
Lab 7 Minimum Shift Keying  (MSK) (1 weeks)
Lab 8 Quadrature Amplitude Modulation (QAM) (1 weeks)
Lab 9 Introduction to USRP (1 week)
scorePolicy:
1.各項目之實驗結果。
2.實驗報告。
3.平時考。
4.出席率。
materials:
1. 莊智清 等編著 通訊系統設計與實習 (全華圖書)
2. 陳瓊興、陳竹正編著 LabVIEW 與感測電路應用 (高立圖書)
3. 自編講義
